item.description: Potluck/Meetup:  Saturday May 19, 1 to 4 PM  All things Indigo.  I have read that indigos are everything from children who will save the world to people who are good with computers!  This gathering will offer APOL's thoughts on the matter and also explanations as to how all this intuition kind of thing works.  It is a good session for those who have been wanting to find out information, but have been too busy or too shy to ask!  Susan Gale, co author of Psychic Children and Soulful Parenting, will be speaking.  She has also appeared on A&E on Psychic  Children and Children of the Paranormal and has been working with intuitive people exclusively since 2003.  She has been a speaker on several occasions at the VA Beach ARE and has appeared on numerous radio shows.  Prior to that she worked with children and their families in a variety of child care, camp and school settings.  Please bring food to share and an open mind!
item.how_to_find_us: come in from the upper porch
item.name: Of all things Indigo
